debug_info.user_query: show me some difficult level course in  cricket from coursera and  and  data science courses from simply learnt platform

llm_generated_queries.thought_process: User asked for courses in 'cricket' and 'data science'. Expanding 'data science' to include synonyms. Targeting specific platforms (Coursera and Simplilearn) and filtering for 'difficult' level courses. I assume difficult is synonymous with expert or advanced.

original_data.Title: Data Science with R Certification Course
original_data.Short Intro: Simplilearnâ€™s Data Science with R certification course makes you an expert in data analytics using the R programming language. This data science with R course enables you to take your Data Science skills into a variety of companies, helping them analyze data and make more informed business decisions. With dedicated mentoring sessions, this R course incorporates cutting-edge curriculum to help you develop job-ready skills. Enroll in our R training and build expertise in data science right away.

original_data.Title: Professional Certificate Course in AI and Machine Learning
original_data.Short Intro: Become an AI and ML expert with this Machine Learning Course. Learn the latest tools and technologies of the AI world through live classes delivered by industry experts, hands-on labs, Industry-relevant projects and masterclasses from distinguished IIT Kanpur faculty.

original_data.Title: Data Analyst
original_data.Short Intro: This Data Analytics course in collaboration with IBM makes you a Data Analytics expert. Our Data Analyst course helps you learn analytics tools and techniques, how to work with SQL databases, R and Python, how to create data visualizations, and apply statistics and predictive analytics in a business environment. This Data Analytics certification also features Masterclasses from IBM experts.
original_data.Course Type: Ranked #1 Best Data Analytics Certification Course by Career Karma
